channel.title: Next step after you make a sprite?
channel.description:
Hey had a question, after your done making a sprite where do u put? Say you were using noobscape as your source? how do you make ur sprite visible in game?
[URL=https://imageshack.com/i/pm2pn4SCp][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/922/2pn4SC.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Next step after you make a sprite?

item.description:
@brwn wrote:

I can help, do you have Skype xrune??

Read full topic

item.title: Next step after you make a sprite?

item.description:
@stEps wrote:

figure out where they left off at. then continue from that number +1

item.title: Next step after you make a sprite?
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

xrune:

i found the sprites.rscd in the client folder, but they are files, dunno how to open them …? ill check out what you said tho as well…

have a question, im having trouble understanding what ids to give to the items after u make the .spr, in the items.rscd, and itemdef.xml?

Read full topic
item.source: Next step after you make a sprite?

item.title: Next step after you make a sprite?
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

you need to repack the sprite file, update your client to read the new sprites, update your def’s client and server sided for all new sprites. Then you should be good to go.

Read full topic
